title: In 'Clouds Of Sils Maria,' An Actress Faces Past, Present And Future In An Instant
teaser: Juliette Binoche plays an aging movie star who's about to appear in a play opposite an infamous young Hollywood actress. It's a hall of mirrors that sounds convoluted in the telling, but plays easily.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
